alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Dubuque; Jones; Linn (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 3:57PM CDT until June 15 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CDT FOR DUBUQUE...NORTHWESTERN JONES...EASTERN DELAWARE AND NORTHEASTERN LINN COUNTIES... At 357 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Matsell Bridge Natural Area, or near Anamosa, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Langworthy around 400 PM CDT. Buck Creek around 405 PM CDT. Monticello, Jones County Fairgrounds and Monticello Municipal Airport around 410 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Hopkinton, Worthington, Dyersville, Farley, New Vienna, New Wine Park, Epworth, Peosta, Bankston, Camp Little Cloud, Lattnerville, Dubuque, Holy Cross, Centralia, Graf, Bankston Park, Cottage Hill and Five Points. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for northeastern and east central Iowa.
